application.doc: Extracting a personal certificate from a certificate database

param.name: cert_id
param.doc: Name of the certificate request to export.

method.name: POST
method.doc: To extract a personal certificate from a certificate database with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the SSL Certificates personal certificate resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: operation
param.doc: The type of operation to perform. In this case, the value is "extract".

param.name: password
param.doc: The password of the target certificate container.

param.name: type
param.doc: The format of the target certificate container. Supported formats are pkcs12.

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
